scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run start --prefix frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix backend && npm run build --prefix frontend && npm run delete-current-build
scripts.install:app: echo INSTALLING BACKEND && cd ./backend && npm i && npm i --D && echo INSTALLING FRONTEND && cd ../frontend && npm i && npm i --D && echo INSTALLING APP && cd .. && npm i
scripts.all: npm run install:app && npm run build
